utils

Interface ServerProtocol

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Client, ClientHandler, Server, ServerGame

    public interface ServerProtocol
    The Protocol for server received messages.
    contains all strings the user may send.
    Author:
    Jordy Brinks

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String ACCEPT_CHALLENGE
      A message sent by a user when accepting a challenge.
      static java.lang.String CHAT
      a message sent by the user to send a message to the current channel.
      static java.lang.String GET_LEADERBOARD
      A message sent by a client to request the leaderboard
      usage: getLeaderboard Errors: error invalidClient if sender is ingame or the sender/server does not support SEND_LEADERBOARD as provided in SEND_HELLO
      static java.lang.String MAKE_GAME
      A message sent by the server to indicate 2 clients a game has been created.
      static java.lang.String MAKE_MOVE
      A message sent by the server to indicate a valid move has been played.
      static java.lang.String REJECT_CHALLENGE
      A message sent by a user when rejecting a challenge.
      static java.lang.String SEND_CHALLENGE
      a message sent by a client when challenging another user .
      static java.lang.String SEND_CHALLENGE_CANCELLED
      a message sent by the server to a client who has challenged, to indicate the other did not accept.
      static java.lang.String SEND_CHALLENGED
      a message sent by the server to indicate a client, another client has challenged him.
      static java.lang.String SEND_CHAT
      A command sent by the server to give clients a chatmessage.
      Every chatmessage is sent to all clients in the corresponding game / lobby, IF they support chat.
      syntax: sendChat nick message
      parameters: nick The nickname of the client.
      message The message that has been said.
      static java.lang.String SEND_ERROR_INVALIDCLIENT
      error message used when a command is used that is not supported by client/server
      static java.lang.String SEND_ERROR_INVALIDCOMMAND
      error message given when a command is unknown or there has been wrong usage of a known command.
      static java.lang.String SEND_ERROR_INVALIDMOVE
      Error message given when a move is invalid.
      static java.lang.String SEND_ERROR_INVALIDNAME
      Error message given if an invalid name has been sent by a command.
      static java.lang.String SEND_GAME_OVER
      A message sent by the server to indicate a game is over.
      static java.lang.String SEND_HELLO
      A message sent by a user when joining the server and a message sent by the server, after receiving hello by a client.
      static java.lang.String SEND_LEADERBOARD
      A message sent by the server containing all clients with their scores.
      static java.lang.String SEND_MOVE
      A message sent by a client to indicate he wants to make a move.
      static java.lang.String SEND_PLAY
      A message sent by a client to indicate he wants to play a game
      usage: play Errors: error invalidCommand if arguments.size != 0
      static java.lang.String SEND_PLAYERS
      A message sent by the server containing all current clients and their clientnumber (in 3 bits)
      This message will be sent after a change to the clientlist, to all users in the lobby.
      usage: sendPlayers player1 code, player2 code, player3 code [...]
      extra: spaces between code and player, commas between every pair.
      static java.lang.String SEND_QUIT
      A message sent by a user when leaving.

    • Field Detail

      • SEND_HELLO

        static final java.lang.String SEND_HELLO
        A message sent by a user when joining the server and a message sent by the server, after receiving hello by a client.
        Usage client:
        hello code nickname.
        usage server:
        hello code

          parameters:
            code the clientcode in 3 bits. first bit for chat, second bit for challenge, third bit for leaderboard
            name the (unique) nickname of the client.
          Errors:
            error invalidName if the name is already in use by another client.
            client: error invalidCommand if Arguments.size != 2 || code.size != 3 || !code.matches("[01]+") server: error invalidCommand if Arguments.size != 1 || code.size != 3 || !code.matches("[01]+")
          See Also:
          Constant Field Values

        • SEND_QUIT

          static final java.lang.String SEND_QUIT
          A message sent by a user when leaving.
          used to notify the server the user has left so sockets can be closed.
          usage: quit
            Errors:
              error invalidCommand if arguments.size != 0
            See Also:
            Constant Field Values

          • SEND_PLAY

            static final java.lang.String SEND_PLAY
            A message sent by a client to indicate he wants to play a game

              usage: play Errors:
                error invalidCommand if arguments.size != 0
              See Also:
              MAKE_GAME, Constant Field Values

            • SEND_MOVE

              static final java.lang.String SEND_MOVE
              A message sent by a client to indicate he wants to make a move.
              This message can only be sent if the client is in a game and has the current turn.
              usage: move Num

                parameters:
                  Num the field to make a move. number in the range 0 to 6.
                Errors:
                  error invalidCommand if arguments.size != 1 || !Integer.isInteger(Num)
                  error invalidMove if client.game == null || Num < 0 || num > 6, or if client does not have the turn.
                See Also:
                MAKE_MOVE, Constant Field Values

              • CHAT

                static final java.lang.String CHAT
                a message sent by the user to send a message to the current channel.
                a channel is either a gameroom or the lobby.
                usage: chat message

                  parameters:
                    message the message to broadcast. can not be empty.
                  Errors:
                    error invalidCommand if the message is null or empty.
                    error invalidClient if the sender or server is does not support CHAT as provided in SEND_HELLO.
                  See Also:
                  SEND_CHAT, Constant Field Values

                • SEND_CHALLENGE

                  static final java.lang.String SEND_CHALLENGE
                  a message sent by a client when challenging another user .
                  usage: challenge user

                    parameters:
                      user the user to send the message (id). can not be empty
                    Errors:
                      error invalidClient if user is not logged on or the user,sender or server does not support SEND_CHALLENGE as provided in SEND_HELLO
                      error invalidCommand if invalid arguments are specified.
                    See Also:
                    SEND_CHALLENGED, SEND_CHALLENGE_CANCELLED, Constant Field Values

                  • ACCEPT_CHALLENGE

                    static final java.lang.String ACCEPT_CHALLENGE
                    A message sent by a user when accepting a challenge.
                    As this does not specify which user he accepts, the rule has to be made by the server there can only be 1 challenge to a client.
                    usage: acceptChallenge
                      Errors:
                        error invalidCommand if arguments.size != 0 || !client.isChallenged()
                      See Also:
                      Constant Field Values

                    • REJECT_CHALLENGE

                      static final java.lang.String REJECT_CHALLENGE
                      A message sent by a user when rejecting a challenge.
                      As this does not specify which user he rejects, the rule has to be made by the server there can only be 1 challenge to a client.
                      usage: rejectChallenge
                        Errors:
                          error invalidCommand if arguments.size != 0 || !client.isChallenged()
                        See Also:
                        Constant Field Values

                      • GET_LEADERBOARD

                        static final java.lang.String GET_LEADERBOARD
                        A message sent by a client to request the leaderboard
                        usage: getLeaderboard
                          Errors:
                            error invalidClient if sender is ingame or the sender/server does not support SEND_LEADERBOARD as provided in SEND_HELLO
                          See Also:
                          Constant Field Values

                        • MAKE_GAME

                          static final java.lang.String MAKE_GAME
                          A message sent by the server to indicate 2 clients a game has been created.
                          This message will be sent to both clients in the game.
                          usage: makeGame player1 player2

                            parameters:
                              player1 the first player
                              player2 the second player
                            Errors:
                              error invalidCommand if arguments.size != 2
                              error invalidClient if !player1.isOn || !player2.isOn || player1.inGame || player2.inGame
                            See Also:
                            Constant Field Values

                          • MAKE_MOVE

                            static final java.lang.String MAKE_MOVE
                            A message sent by the server to indicate a valid move has been played.
                            This message will only be sent after a valid move receive from a client, to all client in that game.
                            usage: makeMove Num

                              parameters:
                                Num the field to make a move. number in the range 0 to 6.
                              Errors:
                                error invalidCommand if arguments.size != 1 || !Integer.isInteger(Num)
                                error invalidMove if client.game == null || Num < 0 || num > 6, or if client does not have the turn.
                              See Also:
                              Constant Field Values

                            • SEND_GAME_OVER

                              static final java.lang.String SEND_GAME_OVER
                              A message sent by the server to indicate a game is over.
                              This message will be sent to all people in that game.
                              usage: gameOver isDraw Winner

                                parameters:
                                  isDraw a boolean. true if draw, false otherwise.
                                  Winner The name of the winner of the game.
                                Errors:
                                  error invalidCommand if arguments.size != 1 || !Boolean.isBoolean(isDraw)
                                  error invalidMove if client.game == null || Num < 0 || num > 6, or if client does not have the turn. error invalidName if !player1.equals(Winner) && !player2.equals(Winner)
                                See Also:
                                Constant Field Values

                              • SEND_PLAYERS

                                static final java.lang.String SEND_PLAYERS
                                A message sent by the server containing all current clients and their clientnumber (in 3 bits)
                                This message will be sent after a change to the clientlist, to all users in the lobby.
                                usage: sendPlayers player1 code, player2 code, player3 code [...]
                                extra: spaces between code and player, commas between every pair.

                                  parameters:
                                    Player the name of the player.
                                    code the 3 bit code what client supports as described in SEND_HELLO
                                  Errors:
                                    error invalidCommand if the given syntax does not follow the usage.
                                  See Also:
                                  Constant Field Values

                                • SEND_LEADERBOARD

                                  static final java.lang.String SEND_LEADERBOARD
                                  A message sent by the server containing all clients with their scores.
                                  This message is ordered by score. if score is the same, ordered Alphabetically.
                                  A win is 2 points, a draw is 1 point, a lose is 0 points.
                                  usage: sendLeaderboard player1 score, player2 score, player3 score [...]
                                  extra: spaces between code and player, commas between every pair.

                                    parameters:
                                      Player the name of the player.
                                      score the score of a player.
                                    Errors:
                                      error invalidCommand if the given syntax does not follow the usage.
                                      error invalidClient if sender is ingame or the sender/server does not support SEND_LEADERBOARD as provided in SEND_HELLO
                                    See Also:
                                    Constant Field Values

                                  • SEND_CHAT

                                    static final java.lang.String SEND_CHAT
                                    A command sent by the server to give clients a chatmessage.
                                    Every chatmessage is sent to all clients in the corresponding game / lobby, IF they support chat.
                                    syntax: sendChat nick message

                                      parameters:
                                        nick The nickname of the client.
                                        message The message that has been said.
                                      Errors:
                                        error invalidCommand if argument.size < 2 error invalidClient if sent to a client that does not support chat.
                                      See Also:
                                      Constant Field Values

                                    • SEND_CHALLENGED

                                      static final java.lang.String SEND_CHALLENGED
                                      a message sent by the server to indicate a client, another client has challenged him.

                                      parameters:
                                        user the user that started the challenge.
                                      Errors:
                                        error invalidClient if user/sender is not logged on/ingame or the user/sender/server does not support SEND_CHALLENGE as provided in SEND_HELLO
                                        error invalidCommand if arguments.size != 1
                                      See Also:
                                      SEND_CHALLENGE_CANCELLED, Constant Field Values

                                    • SEND_CHALLENGE_CANCELLED

                                      static final java.lang.String SEND_CHALLENGE_CANCELLED
                                      a message sent by the server to a client who has challenged, to indicate the other did not accept.
                                      usage: challengeCancelled reason
                                      parameters:
                                        reason the reason why a user did not accept. can only be one of the following: reject, ingame, quit
                                      Errors:
                                        error invalidClient if user/sender is not logged on/ingame or the user/sender/server does not support SEND_CHALLENGE as provided in SEND_HELLO
                                        error invalidCommand if arguments.size != 1 || !(reason.equals("reject") || reason.equals("ingame") || reason.equals("quit"))
                                      See Also:
                                      Constant Field Values

                                    • SEND_ERROR_INVALIDNAME

                                      static final java.lang.String SEND_ERROR_INVALIDNAME
                                      Error message given if an invalid name has been sent by a command.
                                      See Also:
                                      Constant Field Values

                                    • SEND_ERROR_INVALIDCOMMAND

                                      static final java.lang.String SEND_ERROR_INVALIDCOMMAND
                                      error message given when a command is unknown or there has been wrong usage of a known command.
                                      See Also:
                                      Constant Field Values

                                    • SEND_ERROR_INVALIDCLIENT

                                      static final java.lang.String SEND_ERROR_INVALIDCLIENT
                                      error message used when a command is used that is not supported by client/server
                                      See Also:
                                      Constant Field Values

                                    • SEND_ERROR_INVALIDMOVE

                                      static final java.lang.String SEND_ERROR_INVALIDMOVE
                                      Error message given when a move is invalid.
                                      See Also:
                                      Constant Field Values
